full_text: FedEx Adjustment Request FAX TO (800) 548-3020 Invoice Number: 4-447-40902 Invoice Date: Nov 11, 2002 Account Number: 1144-2081-6 Page: 2 of 11 Tracking No./Airbill No. Reason Code Explanation BEFORE YOU FAX Please include detailed explanation for each adjustment request.
